bamboo-lance.title: Bamboo Lance
bamboo-lance.description: A simple spear fashioned from fresh bamboo.

battle-fork.title: Battle Fork
battle-fork.description: A fair-sized fork that makes short work of aquatic enemies.

celestial-spear.title: Celestial Spear
celestial-spear.description: A super-sized spear suffused with a sacred light that zaps zombies.

demon-spear.title: Demon Spear
demon-spear.description: A spear that can floor a foe with a single well-sighted strike.

gigasteel-lance.title: Gigasteel Lance
gigasteel-lance.description: A souped-up steel lance with superior penetrative potential.

gracos-s-trident.title: Gracos's Trident
gracos-s-trident.description: A spear said to once have been used by an emperor of the ocean.

halberd.title: Halberd
halberd.description: A whopper of a weapon with elements of both a spear and a battle-axe.

hero-spear.title: Hero Spear
hero-spear.description: A spear that serves to restore its bearer's HP with every strike.

special.effect: Returns 25% of damage dealt as HP

holy-lance.title: Holy Lance
holy-lance.description: A holy lance blessed by the Almighty that zealously zaps zombies.

iron-lance.title: Iron Lance
iron-lance.description: A spear made of iron for everyday action.

lightning-lance.title: Lightning Lance
lightning-lance.description: A magical spear within which lingers the power of lightning.

liquid-metal-spear.title: Liquid Metal Spear
liquid-metal-spear.description: A supreme spear packed with the power of liquid metal slimes.

metal-king-spear.title: Metal King Spear
metal-king-spear.description: A supreme spear packed with the power of metal king slimes.

metal-slime-spear.title: Metal Slime Spear
metal-slime-spear.description: A supreme spear packed with the power of metal slimes.

partisan.title: Partisan
partisan.description: A sizeable spear with blades stemming from the sides of the spike.

poker.title: Poker
poker.description: A lavish lance that can shoot through any shield.

red-hot-poker.title: Red-Hot Poker
red-hot-poker.description: An unrivalled lance that can shoot through any shield.

sandstorm-spear.title: Sandstorm Spear
sandstorm-spear.description: A spear that sends sand to blind baddies if used as an item in battle.

split-pot-poker.title: Split-Pot Poker
split-pot-poker.description: A lethal lance that can shoot through any shield.

steel-lance.title: Steel Lance
steel-lance.description: A basic spear with a steel spike.

storm-spear.title: Storm Spear
storm-spear.description: A spear said to have served a god of thunder in bygone days.

stud-poker.title: Stud Poker
stud-poker.description: An alarming lance that can shoot through any shield.

trident.title: Trident
trident.description: A three-pronged fork that facilitates the filleting of fishy foes.
